content: want to sew the feet with about 4-5 sts apart from each other we are making a tripod out of the feet and tail to help the bunny sit up tail- using white yarn and 3 5mm hook round 1 chain 2 6 single_crochet 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 2 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * 8 single_crochet hide beginning end round 3 *decrease single_crochet in next 2 sts * repeat from * to * 6 single_crochet fasten_off with long tail to sew to body before sewing to body take a wire brush and brush the tail until is becomes fuzzy then sew to body on last round of the body do not stuff the tail hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions about my pattern please contact me at petalsandbows@gmail com you can follow me on facebook at https //www facebook com/petalsandbows copyright 2023 erica townsend this pattern may not be copied sold or given away without the express written permission of the author products made using this pattern are the property of the maker and may be sold traded or given away and are not covered by this copyright
